name: WebGLRenderingContext.deleteBuffer
description: The WebGLRenderingContext.deleteBuffer() method of the WebGL API deletes a given WebGLBuffer. This method has no effect if the buffer has already been deleted.

refs.name: WebGL 1.0
refs.description: The definition of 'deleteBuffer' in the 'WebGL 1.0' specification.

refs.name: OpenGL ES 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'glDeleteBuffers' in the 'OpenGL ES 2.0' specification.
